articles.content: As was the case when the technology debuted last year, just two brands have embraced QD-OLED TVs for 2023: Samsung and Sony. Samsung's support was inevitable, of course, given that the South Korean b… [+18867 chars]

articles.author: Deirdre O'Donnell
articles.title: iQOO 12 with Xiaomi-esque camera hump emerges in new hands-on leak - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: iQOO's upcoming flagship smartphones are said to be the subject of a new leak that consists of a photo of a heretofore-unseen handset in the wild. Should that be the case, the 12 and 12 Pro have undergone a potentially significant design upgrade over their 11…
articles.content: A new image purporting to show a new premium Android smartphone with an extra-large camera hump protruding from one corner of the rear panel: a description that could easily apply to the upcoming Xia… [+1367 chars]
